The **ClimateSense** consortium met in person at [EURECOM](https://www.eurecom.fr/en/) in Sophia
Antipolis for a two-day working meeting focused on coordination across
work packages and preparation for the next project phase.

#### Day 1: Progress & Planning

The first day was dedicated to work package updates from all partners, covering: 

* Stakeholder engagement and data integration
* Modelling
and geostatistical analysis 
* Platform development and project management

Discussions also addressed short-term priorities, publication plans, and upcoming dissemination activities.

#### Day 2: Innovation & Outreach

On the second day, the consortium welcomed a keynote from [Agoratlas](https://agoratlas.com/en/), introducing approaches to large-scale social media analysis and coordinated online behaviour. This was followed by: 

* Hands-on sessions on annotation and data access 
* Discussions on the ClimateSense
* Communication strategy for future COP events

The meeting concluded with agreement on next steps and coordination for the coming months.
